description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Mine asteroids and struggle to survive on the frontiers of space with only your wits and a tiny mining ship in this arcade-style game.  Dig your way through massive, dynamically generated asteroids and discover ancient alien technology!  Adjust the difficulty anywhere from super-casual to a hard-core fight for survival.  Follow this game on Facebook: facebook.com/Sector749er
